active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, Student A uses 'openssl s_client' to inspect a provided HTTPS site's certificate (e.g., from badssl.com) and explains Subject Alternative Names (SANs), Common Name (CN), and validation process to Student B. Student B quizzes A on key fields and switches roles to reinforce teaching.
active_learning.problem_solving: Provide students with a Wireshark capture or Burp Suite proxy log of a web session. Task: Identify any Certificate Name Mismatch, simulate MITM implications, and design a penetration test report section recommending fixes like proper SAN configuration, HSTS implementation, or certificate pinning. Emphasize reporting best practices.
